TopicTitle: How to See deltaV of stacked maneuvers

Articles.Content:
How does one see the required deltaV for each maneuver if one has more than one?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-08T17:54:24Z" title="05/08/2015 05:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 8, 2015</time> by arkie87**
Mouse over it in map view. The maneuver has to be deselected (not have the colored handles showing).
